meanings.definition: Having the tangy flavor or odor of game, especially meat that is slightly spoiled.
meanings.sent1: The gamy smell of the meat made me wrinkle my nose.
meanings.sent2: The chef added spices to mask the gamy taste of the venison.
meanings.sent3: Despite its gamy aroma, the stew turned out surprisingly delicious.
meanings.sent4: The gamy scent lingered in the kitchen long after the meal was cooked.
meanings.sent5: The gamy flavor of the dish reminded me of the forest.

meanings.definition: Showing a strong desire to win or be successful, often in a competitive or aggressive way.
meanings.sent1: Her gamy determination led her to train harder than anyone else.
meanings.sent2: The team captain's gamy attitude inspired the players to give their all.
meanings.sent3: His gamy competitiveness sometimes got him into trouble with his friends.
meanings.sent4: She had a gamy hunger for success that drove her to achieve her goals.
meanings.sent5: The gamy spirit of the competition fueled their drive to win.
